person.bio: software developer familiar with the programming language golang, react js and vue js for application development
person.about: Hello Minna-san, thank you for visiting my website, my name is Antony Mirasandy born in Tangerang, Indonesia. At this time i want to focus on becoming a software developer and learn more about several programming languages, frameworks that are currently used, and make several projects for exercise

activities.desc: The presentation of the pick my food application, where someone can order food & beverage anywhere and anytime, The programming languages or frameworks used to build this application include Golang for the backend, Reactjs for the frontend, and Kotlin for mobile.
